name: general-orb
description: A general CircleCI orb with helpful reusable jobs and commands

scripts.orb:pack: find src -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d | xargs -I % basename % | xargs -I % ./scripts/pre-pack.sh src % && circleci orb pack --skip-update-check src/ > orb.yml
scripts.orb:validate: yarn orb:pack >/dev/null && circleci orb validate --skip-update-check orb.yml && yarn orb:clean >/dev/null
scripts.orb:cleanup: find src -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d | xargs -I % basename % | xargs -I % ./scripts/rev-pack.sh src % && yes | rm orb.yml
scripts.orb:cleanup:force: find src -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d | xargs -I % basename % | xargs -I % ./scripts/rev-pack.sh src % true; yes | rm orb.yml
